scripts.test:lighthouse: npm run build && npx lighthouse http://localhost:4173 --output=html --output-path=./lighthouse-report.html --view
scripts.test:performance: npm run build && npm run preview & sleep 3 && npm run test:lighthouse && pkill -f vite
scripts.audit:performance: npm run build && npx lighthouse http://localhost:4173 --only-categories=performance,accessibility,best-practices,seo --output=json --output-path=./lighthouse-results.json
